Welcome to Sklearn-Pytorch's documentation!
===========================================


.. toctree::
   :hidden:

   contents.rst


This documents regroups a detailed explanation of the different objects of this library. This is still a work-in-progress
so don't be surprised if some explanations are missing.

The different objects documentations can be found below :

:doc:`Documentation <contents>`
